attributes.action: Let fathers with Parantal responsibilities be allowed to take children abroad
attributes.background: Worries my children’s mother will stop me from taking them away on holiday, why should I have to have written consent when she doesn’t need mine,

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do.

You can find out more about the rules on taking  children abroad here:

https://www.gov.uk/permission-take-child-abroad

If you'd like this to change, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what specific changes you'd like to see.
